name: Biko
tagline: We have been Building Digital Businesses
description:
Biko we are a company of the ICT sector with strong specialization and experience in the online digital business with more than 18 years of experience with companies from different sectors. A team of 60 professionals, in which our customers trust, to land and develop their strategy and their projects online (web portals, mobile applications, ecommerce platforms, custom development ...).
Our deep knowledge of the behavior of users, gives us the ability to understand not only the technology.
